p: oxLDL induces ECs dysfunction and promotes endothelial lipid accumulation as well as leads to a deficiency of autophagy and accelerates atherosclerosis ( 20). The impaired autophagy in oxLDL-treated HUVECs was alleviated by HDE treatment ( Fig. 2F). Under the same conditions, HDE reduced the fluorescen-ce intensity of DiI-oxLDL by almost 40% ( Fig. 2G), demon-strating that a lipid degradation was occurred during autophagy induction.
